forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. West northwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a restless chill, with pockets of moisture whispering through the streets. Currently, the sky is painted in shades of indigo and gray, casting a melancholy hue over the city as the remnants of overnight rain linger. Expect a slight chance of drizzle lingering until late morning before giving way to a gradual emergence of sun. By midday, the clouds will part somewhat, revealing glimpses of blue amid a backdrop of muted city sounds. As temperatures float around a crisp 55 degrees, falling later in the day, the brisk northwest winds will keep the air invigorating—perfect for a comforting stroll along the waterfront or a visit to a cozy café where the warmth of fresh coffee can embrace you.

For those brave enough to venture outdoors, layering will serve you well; a light jacket with a scarf should suffice to fend off the chill and a hint of dampness in the air. The morning fog may cling to the heights and corners, especially near the iconic Golden Gate, blending land and sea in a soft, ethereal dance. Should the marine layer drift further inland, a sense of mystery will envelop your day, lending itself beautifully to exploring lesser-known nooks of the city. Enjoy the simplicity of life in this urban tapestry, whether it’s wandering through murals in the Mission or savoring lunch at a sunlit table. This day holds an understated elegance, a gentle reminder of the beauty found in quiet moments as the city awakens.
